channel.title: John Williams on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in John Williams on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Keep Your Composure
item.description: Hey guys, Ernie here with a fresh piece from Andrew Egan, who last hit us with some chatter on sound design in film. This time, he talks about another aural element of the cinematic experience. Today in Tedium: There is no shortage of colloquialisms that advise you to chill out, take it easy, and don’t sweat the small stuff. But details matter. (Where else are you going to find the devil when you need him?
